mapper.select: SELECT e.employee_seq, e.employee_num, e.employee_name, d.department_seq, d.department_name, SUM(fe.employee_score) AS total_final_eval_score FROM final_eval fe JOIN employee e ON fe.employee_seq = e.employee_seq JOIN department d ON e.department_seq = d.department_seq GROUP BY e.employee_seq

SELECT e.employee_seq, e.employee_num, e.employee_name, d.department_seq, d.department_name, SUM(fe.employee_score) AS total_final_eval_score FROM final_eval fe JOIN employee e ON fe.employee_seq = e.employee_seq JOIN department d ON e.department_seq = d.department_seq WHERE e.employee_num LIKE (CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%')) OR e.employee_name LIKE (CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%')) OR d.department_name LIKE (CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%')) GROUP BY e.employee_seq

SELECT file_seq, f.file_seq AS profile_img_url, e.employee_seq, e.employee_name, e.employee_phone, e.employee_email, d.department_name, e.employee_num FROM employee e LEFT JOIN file f ON e.employee_seq = f.employee_seq JOIN department d ON e.department_seq = d.department_seq WHERE e.employee_seq = #{employee_seq}

SELECT CASE WHEN fe.eval_ind_seq IS NOT NULL AND fe.final_eval_ind_seq IS NULL THEN ei.eval_ind_seq WHEN fe.eval_ind_seq IS NULL AND fe.final_eval_ind_seq IS NOT NULL THEN fei.final_eval_ind_seq END AS final_eval_ind_seq, CASE WHEN fe.eval_ind_seq IS NOT NULL AND fe.final_eval_ind_seq IS NULL THEN ei.eval_ind_content WHEN fe.eval_ind_seq IS NULL AND fe.final_eval_ind_seq IS NOT NULL THEN fei.final_eval_ind_name END AS final_eval_ind_name, fe.employee_score AS final_eval_score FROM final_eval fe LEFT JOIN eval_ind ei ON fe.eval_ind_seq IS NOT NULL AND fe.final_eval_ind_seq IS NULL AND fe.eval_ind_seq = ei.eval_ind_seq LEFT JOIN final_eval_ind fei ON fe.eval_ind_seq IS NULL AND fe.final_eval_ind_seq IS NOT NULL AND fe.final_eval_ind_seq = fei.final_eval_ind_seq WHERE fe.employee_seq = #{employee_seq}
